    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Traveler_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Traveler_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Traveler_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Traveler birthDate="2011-01-24" gender="Male" maritalStatus_Enum="Annulled" nationality="IR" objID="traveler_1" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <OtherID organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</OtherID>
    <PersonRef>a111</PersonRef>
    <TravelerRef>traveler_1</TravelerRef>
    <PersonNameDetail defaultInd="true" language="en" type="Alternate">
        <Prefix>Mr.</Prefix>
        <Given>John</Given>
        <Middle>Example String Value</Middle>
        <Surname>Smith</Surname>
        <SurnamePrefix>Example String Value</SurnamePrefix>
        <Suffix>Example String Value</Suffix>
        <Title>Example String Value</Title>
        <PersonDocument>
            <DocType>NaturalizationCertificate</DocType>
        </PersonDocument>
        <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    </PersonNameDetail>
    <AddressDetail language="en" role="Home" validInd="true">
        <AddressLine>111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland</AddressLine>
        <BldgRoom buldingInd="true">Bldg H</BldgRoom>
        <Number pO_Box="98567499" ruralRouteNmbr="88" streetDirection="NNW" streetNmbrSuffix="B">563</Number>
        <Street>Travers Street</Street>
        <City>Dublin</City>
        <County>Fairfax</County>
        <StateProv name="Texas">TX</StateProv>
        <Country name="Ireland">IR</Country>
        <PostalCode>32165-9999</PostalCode>
        <Remark>This address should be used for all official correspondences.</Remark>
        <Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedOut" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Inherit" shareSyncInd="Yes"/>
        <Type>Business</Type>
        <Use>Billing</Use>
    </AddressDetail>
    <TelephoneDetail areaCityCode="202" countryAccessCode="01" defaultInd="true" extension="237" id="telephone_1" pIN="1234" phoneNumber="5555555" remark="Don't call after 10:00PM" role="Home">
        <Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="Unknown" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="No" shareSyncInd="Inherit"/>
        <PhoneLocationType>Brand reservations office</PhoneLocationType>
        <PhoneTechType>Voice</PhoneTechType>
        <PhoneUseType>Contact</PhoneUseType>
    </TelephoneDetail>
    <Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
        <Address>Example String Value</Address>
        <Type>Business</Type>
        <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    </Email>
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedOut" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Inherit" shareSyncInd="Yes"/>
    <Comments language="en">Some fee text.</Comments>
    <VIP description="Example String Value" source="Example String Value">Example String Value</VIP>
    <PersonDocument>
        <DocType>PassportCard</DocType>
    </PersonDocument>
</Traveler>

      {
  "TravelerSummary" : {
    "objID" : "traveler_1",

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        VIP
        VIP details.
        Details
        Type VIP
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        PersonDocument
        A legal document identifying a traveler (e.g. passport, driver's license).
        Details
        Type PersonDocument
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 5

      • Properties inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Traveler_ID

        TravelerRef

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        nationality
        Identifies the nationality of the traveler for this trip.
        Details
        Type CountryCode_ISO3166
        Example Value IR
        Required false
        Pattern [a-zA-Z]{2}
        Max Occurrences 1
